meanings.sent1: She was retieing her shoelaces to make sure they stayed secure.
meanings.sent2: After the rope came loose, he quickly began retieing it to the post.
meanings.sent3: The magician kept retieing the knots, but they always seemed to come undone on their own!
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like retieing a knot that kept unraveling no matter how many times she tried.
meanings.sent5: The image of retieing a bow on a present perfectly captured the idea of starting over and making things right.

meanings.sent1: His retieing of the knot was done with precision and care.
meanings.sent2: The retieing of the ribbon added a lovely touch to the gift.
meanings.sent3: The retieing of the boat to the dock was met with cheers from the onlookers.
meanings.sent4: The retieing of old friendships can bring back cherished memories.
meanings.sent5: The retieing of the thread symbolized the connection between past and present.
